mapper.select: SELECT H.* , ROWNUM no FROM (SELECT ( 6371 * acos( cos( RADIANS(126.8879957) ) * cos( RADIANS( HP_X ) ) * cos( RADIANS( HP_Y) - RADIANS(35.1535583) ) + sin( RADIANS(126.8879957) ) * sin( RADIANS( HP_X) ) ) ) AS distanceXY ,H.* FROM HP H WHERE hp_name like '%'||#{hp_name}||'%' AND H.sido_name ='광주' order by 1 asc ) H WHERE ROWNUM < 100
